article: cuba 's foreign minister roberto robaina pledged thursday his country would extend `` maximum '' cooperation to help end a hostage standoff at the japanese embassy residence in the peruvian capital of lima .
abstract: cuba 's foreign minister in tokyo for talks over hostage crisis
